title: Clean Air Act - regulates lead in fuels

content.prompt: Which of the following best describes one way the Clean Air Act helped reduce air pollution?

choices.label: Implemented a program to manage hazardous and nonhazardous wastes
Proposed incentives for countries to reduce carbon emissions
Created a fund to aid developing countries in reducing ozone-depleting emissions
Introduced regulatory measures to control the amount of lead in fuels

skill.text: Skill 7.B: Describe potential responses or approaches to environmental problems.
